title: No password reset was sent
body:
I recently sent in an email for my main account, i believe i was hacked, i provided proof it was my account and received an email telling me i did so, in the email it said they would sent me a password reset link, but i have yet to received the email, my ticket reference is #20736512


Sincerely xXQu1ksc0eperXx

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, I'll see if I can get an update on your ticket for you.

Edit: The latest reply to your ticket was at 10AM this morning, this reply stated another password reset link has been sent and contained steps to reset your password if you still haven't received the email.

Please follow up with Player Support again regarding this issue if you're still unable to get this resolved.

See you on the rift,
Seph
